definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else

sentences.english: If I see you next to never , how can we say forever.
sentences.chinese: 假如你不能再回還，豈能相約永相愛。

sentences.english: Please return your key before you leave.
sentences.chinese: 您分開時，請回還您的鑰匙。

sentences.english: In time all Sam's money was paid back in this way.
sentences.chinese: 山姆所有的錢終於都用這種辦法回還了。

sentences.english: Yes, how many years can some people exist Before they're allowed to be free ?
sentences.chinese: 人們能支撐多少年，直到自由終於回還？

sentences.english: First day of love never comes back.
Are you going to return it here?
